TopicTitle: MechJeb2 not appearing for one vehicle

Articles.Content: I used MechJeb2 last night on a vehicle I landed on the Mun; this morning the MechJeb2 menu isn't appearing anywhere for that one vehicle. It appears as normal for other vehicles in the same game, as well as the VAB/SPH, and in the default game. I've tried restarting KSP as well as reinstalling MechJeb2. The only settings I've changed between sessions was some EVA controls, and that was only impacting kerbals on EVA (duh). So what did I set for that vehicle that's hidden MJ from me altogether, just for that vehicle, and how do I undo it? :-/
Possibly an issue with the save file; find another craft in the save file and copy+paste all MechJeb’s stuff to the one that is having problems and it might work again.

22 hours ago, maddog59 said:

his morning the MechJeb2 menu isn't appearing anywhere for that one vehicle

When you righ-click a command pod or probe core on that craft, does the window have a "MechJeb enabled/disabled" button or none at all?

7 hours ago, HansAcker said:

When you righ-click a command pod or probe core on that craft, does the window have a "MechJeb enabled/disabled" button or none at all?

Aaaaargh! It was disabled ... so of course as soon as I enabled it life was grand and glorious again. Thank you!
